I'm more interested in this comment section than the fucking doujin itself. To straighten things up, there are some places in the world that actually still considers kissing as a pretty big deal. Mostly because their religion/culture restricts intimate relationship before marriage. Even if seeing someone is kissing in public is fine for most people, their religion still says otherwise. I don't say that in Japan it's like that. I don't think their culture is like that either. But even so, this doujin is still plain as ever. Not that I hate it, but it's not interesting enough. Nothing stands out enough for me to love it. It's still pretty fappable tho. It's arousing, for some, and most importantly, awesome art.
